texts.description: The file defines the MAM application errors. The error message are localized. When the Metering SDK returns an error to the MAM looks up the message in the MetraTech Global Message Dll. (Actually this task is performed by the MDM.)

text.value: [DE]E-Mail is not valid
[DE]Password does not match confirm password - please try again
[DE]Billing Cycle error. The first day of the month must be less than the second day of the month.
[DE]E-Mail is required
[DE]Namespace description not found. Namespace=[NAME_SPACE]
[DE]A system error has occurred. Please have your administrator check the system log, and try again later.
[DE]An unknown error has occurred. Please have your administrator check the system log, and try again later.
[DE]Too many accounts found. Please narrow your search.
[DE]Please enter at least one criteria to search on.
[DE]Please enter a value to search on.
[DE]This feature is only supported in IE version 4.0 and above.
[DE]The E-Mail notification failed, Please have your administrator check the system log, and try again later.
[DE]Subscriber [ACCOUNT_ID] not found by MAM().Subscriber().Find() in SubscriberFound.Asp.
[DE]Previous account status [PREVIOUS] or new account status [NEW] mismatch error.
[DE]Method MAM.Find() returned FALSE.
[DE]Internal error.
[DE]Internal database error, the credit was not found. Record count is zero. Please contact your administrator.
[DE]Find error - No rowset returned for user [USERNAME].
[DE]Impossible to retrieve output session from the AccountCreation metering. Please contact your administrator.
[DE]Impossible to read the new account id from the output session. Please contact your administrator.
[DE]Billing Cycle error. The first day of the month must be between 1 and 30 and the second day of the month must be between 2 and 31.
[DE]Ticketing file [FILENAME] not found.
[DE]The user name already exists.
[DE]Details
[DE]Cannot get credit card information. Please contact your administrator.
[DE]Cannot get ACH information. Please contact your administrator.
[DE]The batch operation failed and all changes were rolled back.
[DE]You must specify an account for discount distribution by selecting it from the Account Finder.
[DE]Invalid ancestor account
[DE]Invalid payer account
[DE]You do not have access to manage: [ACCOUNT_ID].
[DE]Discount account format is invalid.
[DE]The group has been created. Please select accounts to add. Or click cancel to go back.
[DE]Unable to refresh the account catalog. Please logout and login again.
[DE]You must specify at least one account.
[DE]There are no accounts in your current selection.
[DE]You must specify a valid account id to describe the hierarchy path.
[DE]The batch subscription failed for some accounts.
[DE]Please enter a valid account ID.
[DE]No transactions found.
[DE]Select a child transaction
[DE]You must compute the adjustment before viewing details or saving it
[DE][TEXT_KEYTERM_PRICEABLE_ITEM] [NAME] has no adjustment types configured.
[DE]No [TEXT_KEYTERM_PRICEABLE_ITEM] Type with Adjustment(s) found in the Product Catalog. There are no transactions that can be adjusted.
[DE]Cannot find the orphan adjustment [SESSIONID].
[DE]Please select [ITEM]
[DE]Internal Error. Cannot find the Session ID [SESSIONID] in the transaction rowset
[DE]No default payment method was set up for the account. It has been reset to cash/check.
[DE]No item selected
[DE]MAM_ERROR_1048-Adjustment Display Internal Error
[DE]You must enter a valid parent account ID.
[DE]Please select either a Billing Interval or both the Start Date and End Date for the search.
[DE]Please select at least one transaction.

[DE] The batch template operation failed for some accounts.

Please note that any account update operations that succeeded will not be rolled back. However, Group Subscriptions are done in a single transaction. This means that if there is an error with one of the accounts being placed in a Group Subscription none of them will be added.
[DE]Account cannot be moved to another namespace.
[DE]An error occurred while adding the id mapping. Please have your administrator check the system log.
[DE]An error occurred while removing an id mapping. Please have your administrator check the system log.
[DE]An error occurred while updating the id mapping. Please have your administrator check the system log.
[DE]An error occurred while creating the connection. Please have your administrator check the system log.
[DE]An error occurred while removing the connection. Please have your administrator check the system log.
[DE]An error occurred while updating the connection dates. Please have your administrator check the system log.
[DE]An error occurred while moving the connection. Please have your administrator check the system log.
[DE]An error occurred while creating the [TEXT_KEYTERM_SERVICE_ENDPOINT]. Please have your administrator check the system log.
[DE]Unable to determine Corporate Account ID from the specified value. Value should be an account ID or have the format Name (ID).
[DE]Unable to determine [TEXT_SE_ID] from the specified value. Value should be a valid [TEXT_SE_ID] or have the format: Name (ID).
[DE]The specified value for [TEXT_SE_ID] does not map to an existing [TEXT_KEYTERM_SERVICE_ENDPOINT].
[DE]Failed to delete account template. Please have your administrator check the system log.
[DE]One or more warnings occurred, Adjustment cannot be saved
[DE]Failed to create account template. Please have your administrator check the system log.
[DE]No accounts found to apply template to.
[DE]The batch operation failed and all changes were rolled back.
